<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node that makes particles emitted in a shape defined by a [Mesh](Mesh.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

[VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter.md) that makes the particles emitted in a shape of the assigned [mesh](VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter.md#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_mesh). It will emit from the mesh's surfaces, either all or only the specified one.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

      <td>[use_all_surfaces](#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_use_all_surfaces)</td>
      <td>`true`</td>
    </tr>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Mesh](Mesh.md) **mesh** [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_mesh)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mesh**\ (\ value\: [Mesh](Mesh.md)\ )
- [Mesh](Mesh.md) **get_mesh**\ (\ )

The [Mesh](Mesh.md) that defines emission shape.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_surface_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **surface_index** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_surface_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_surface_index**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_surface_index**\ (\ )

Index of the surface that emits particles. [use_all_surfaces](VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter.md#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_use_all_surfaces) must be ``false`` for this to take effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_use_all_surfaces"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **use_all_surfaces** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeParticleMeshEmitter_property_use_all_surfaces)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_all_surfaces**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_use_all_surfaces**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the particles will emit from all surfaces of the mesh.
